titleStmt.title: The fourth volume of Plutarch's Lives Translated from the Greek, by several hands.
Lives. English. Vol. IV.
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Jacob Tonson at the Judges Head in Chancery-lane, near FleetStreet,

notesStmt.note: With additional engraved title page, reading: Plutarch's Lives Vol. IIII.
Imperfect: copy catalogued lacks pp.489-496; pp.487-488 are bound after the table in the preliminary leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Judges Head in Chancery-lane, near FleetStreet
